title: Project-Based Biology Learning Achievement Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational biology concepts (cell structure, ecosystem principles, etc.)
context.additional_context: Designing customized projects considering spatial intelligence.

learning_goals: Students complete a biology project designed in a PBL format for four weeks with at least 80% completion and demonstrate the ability to write and present lab reports.
Learners submit project outcomes analyzing interactions between organisms using a virtual ecosystem modeling tool.
Achieve a 20% or higher improvement in biology concept comprehension (based on ANCOVA validation) compared to initial diagnostic assessments.

resources: Zoom Accounts & Online Collaboration Tools (Google Jamboard, Padlet, etc.)
Digital Content Creation Kit (Canva for Education)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
